title: What are the most relevant subjects to study? - Quora

response.answer_text: You should learn the subjects that you need to survive. I can provide a list (which I do below), but it would in no way be exhaustive and the list for every person would be slightly different anyway. For example, I might tell you that it would be a good idea to learn how to change a tire, but if you never own a car and live in a place where car travel is unnecessary and rare, why would that be important? You should learn the basics.You should know how to start a fire and maintain & control it once you’ve done so.You should know how to cook basic foods.You should know the difference between poisonous and non-poisonous (for plants) and venomous and non-venomous (for reptiles).You should know how to properly communicate without the need of tablets/screens and through both the written and spoken word.You should know basic mathematics (A/S/M/D, percentages, etc).You should understand basic finance.You should learn to at least be able to keep yourself afloat in water (even better, learn to swim).You should learn the difference between love and lust.You should learn how to care more for at least one other person than you do for yourself. Like I said, this is not an exhaustive list, but it is a place to start. Perhaps people could add other items to the list in the comments…
